name: Colors - Short Story
description:
Explore A Small World Made Of Puzzles In This Slow Paced Game

Features -

  1. Music Gallery (Jordan Ottesen)
  2. Level Selector 
  3. 15 Rich Design Levels
  4. Touch Screen Support
  5. Beautiful Effects To Enhance Gameplay
  6. Cutscenes
  7. Story Mode
  8. Level Maker(Not In this Version)

 

Credits

Soundtrack - Jordan Ottesen 

Fonts - Poppy Works

Kenney Nl -Sprites

Wenrexa - UI

"In This Update There Are Only 8 Testing Levels With Almost Mechanics Done"

"The Game Will Have At Least 15 Levels"
